description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns domain registration details (e.g. registrar, contact information, expiration date, name servers) about a particular domain name.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas._v1_whois

improvement: The previous tool name and description were not as effective in persuading selection, but the new name and description have been refined to better fit the query and user feedback.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns domain registration details (e.g. registrar, contact information, expiration date, name servers) for a given domain name.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details

improvement: Based on user feedback, the tool name and description have been refined to better fit the query and user behavior. The new name and description focus more on the specific use case of looking up domain registration details.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns detailed domain registration information (e.g. registrar, contact details, expiration date, name servers) for a given domain name.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details

improvement: Based on user feedback and tool usage, it appears that the current tool name and description are effective in persuading selection when a specific domain name is provided. However, for general information on retrieving WHOIS details or without a specified domain name, other tools like domain_whois_lookup_api.domain_name seem to be more suitable. The new tool name will focus on its ability to provide detailed domain registration information for a given domain name.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns detailed domain registration information (e.g. registrar, contact details, expiration date, name servers) for a specified domain name.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details

improvement: The current tool name and description are effective when a specific domain name is provided, but not suitable for general information or without a specified domain name. The newly_registered_domains.whois tool provides a more comprehensive WHOIS lookup service with additional features like IP address allocation history and domain registration details. However, the whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details tool remains effective when a specific domain name is provided.

Considering the availability of other tools like newly_registered_domains.whois and domain_whois_lookup_api.domain_name, which provide more comprehensive WHOIS lookup services, the whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details tool will focus on its ability to provide detailed domain registration information for a given domain name.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns detailed domain registration information (e.g. registrar, contact details, expiration date, name servers) about a particular domain name.

improvement: Based on user feedback and tool usage, it appears that the tools provided by API Ninjas are effective when a specific domain name is provided. The newly_registered_domains.whois and whois_v2.whois_lookup_v2 tools provide more comprehensive WHOIS lookup services with additional features like IP address allocation history and domain registration details.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns detailed domain registration information (e.g. registrar, contact details, expiration date, name servers) about a particular domain name.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details

improvement: Based on user feedback and tool usage, it appears that the whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_details tool is effective when a specific domain name is provided. However, for general information or without a specified domain name, other tools like newly_registered_domains.whois and domain_whois_lookup_api.domain_name seem to be more suitable. The new tool will provide a WHOIS lookup service in both JSON and XML formats, version 2.
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Performs a WHOIS lookup for a specified domain name and returns the registration details (e.g. registrar, contact information, expiration date, name servers) in either JSON or XML format.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_lookup_v2

improvement: The tool whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_lookup_v2 was selected 53% of the time when a specific domain name is provided, but not suitable for general information or without a specified domain name. Considering the availability of other tools like newly_registered_domains.whois and domain_whois_lookup_api.domain_name, which provide more comprehensive WHOIS lookup services. The new tool will focus on its ability to provide detailed domain registration information for a given domain name.
description: WHOIS Lookup Endpoint: Retrieves domain registration details such as registrar, contact information, expiration date, and name servers for a specified domain name in either JSON or XML format.
name: whois_by_api_ninjas_v1_whois_lookup
